hero.title: Finnish Excellence in Animal Nutrition
hero.subtitle: Premium feed solutions for optimal animal health and performance

finland.title: Premium Feed.
finland.description: From our mills in Finland to farms across 5 continents — delivering consistent, high-performance nutrition for cattle, poultry, swine, and more.
finland.trustStatement: From Finnish fields to global farms — nutrition that performs.

products.title: Nutrition by Animal
products.description: Specialized formulas crafted for each species. Scroll to explore our complete range.

gallery.title: Behind the Feed
gallery.description: Step inside our world-class Finnish facilities where premium nutrition comes to life. Every pellet reflects our commitment to quality, innovation, and animal welfare.
gallery.trustDescription: We believe in showing you exactly how your animal nutrition is made. From raw materials to final pellets, every step meets the highest Finnish standards.

aboutPage.title: Elvi Inkeri
aboutPage.subtitle: A licensed Finnish feed manufacturer committed to excellence in animal nutrition since 2005.
aboutPage.overviewText1: Elvi Inkeri is a registered Finnish company specializing in the production of high-quality animal feed and nutrition products. With our state-of-the-art manufacturing facility in Finland, we serve customers across Europe and beyond.
aboutPage.overviewText2: Our commitment to quality is backed by official Finnish licensing and strict adherence to EU regulations, ensuring that every product meets the highest standards of safety and nutrition.
aboutPage.value1Desc: Every batch undergoes rigorous testing to ensure optimal nutritional value and safety.
aboutPage.value2Desc: Committed to environmentally responsible production practices and sustainable sourcing.
aboutPage.value3Desc: Continuously researching and developing improved formulations for better animal health.

contactPage.title: Get in Touch
contactPage.subtitle: Ready to discuss your feed requirements? We're here to help.

productsPage.title: Animal Nutrition
productsPage.subtitle: Premium Finnish feed formulations for every species. Scientifically crafted for optimal health and performance.
productsPage.noProducts: No products found in this category.
productsPage.qualityText: Every product is manufactured in Finland under strict EU regulations, ensuring the highest standards of quality, safety, and nutritional excellence.

partnersPage.title: Trusted Partners
partnersPage.subtitle: Certified by leading international standards. Trusted by farms across 25+ countries.
partnersPage.partnersDesc: We work with internationally recognized certification bodies to ensure the highest standards of quality and safety.
partnersPage.certificationsDesc: Every certification represents our commitment to excellence, safety, and transparency in animal nutrition.
partnersPage.exportDesc: From our base in Finland, we export premium animal feed to farms and distributors across Northern Europe and beyond. Our logistics network ensures timely delivery and consistent quality.
partnersPage.ctaText: Interested in distributing FeedElvi products in your region? Let's discuss partnership opportunities.

facilitiesPage.title: World-Class Production
facilitiesPage.subtitle: State-of-the-art manufacturing facilities in Finland, designed for quality, efficiency, and sustainability.
facilitiesPage.overviewDesc: Our main production facility is located in Finland, strategically positioned to serve both domestic and international markets. The plant features the latest technology in feed processing and quality control.
facilitiesPage.galleryDesc: Take a virtual tour of our production facilities and see where quality feed is made.
facilitiesPage.techDesc: Our facility is equipped with cutting-edge technology for every stage of production:

sustainabilityPage.title: Feeding the Future Responsibly
sustainabilityPage.subtitle: Committed to sustainable production practices that protect our planet while nourishing animals worldwide.
sustainabilityPage.pillar1Desc: We prioritize locally sourced raw materials from certified Finnish farms, reducing transportation emissions and supporting local agriculture.
sustainabilityPage.pillar2Desc: Our production processes minimize waste through efficient resource utilization and byproduct recycling programs.
sustainabilityPage.pillar3Desc: Advanced water management systems reduce consumption and ensure responsible wastewater treatment.
sustainabilityPage.pillar4Desc: Investment in energy-efficient equipment and renewable energy sources to reduce our carbon footprint.
sustainabilityPage.pillarsDesc: Environmental responsibility is integrated into every aspect of our operations, from sourcing to production to distribution.
sustainabilityPage.commitmentsDesc: We've set ambitious targets to ensure our operations contribute positively to environmental sustainability and climate action.
sustainabilityPage.carbonDesc: Continuously monitoring and reducing CO2 emissions across our supply chain
sustainabilityPage.waterDesc: Responsible water use with advanced treatment and recycling systems
sustainabilityPage.wasteDesc: Comprehensive recycling programs and waste minimization strategies

qualityPage.title: Uncompromising Quality
qualityPage.subtitle: Every batch tested. Every standard exceeded. Quality is not just a promise—it's our process.
qualityPage.promiseDesc: At FeedElvi, quality is the foundation of everything we do. Our comprehensive quality management system ensures that every product leaving our facility meets the highest standards of safety, nutrition, and consistency.
qualityPage.processDesc: A three-stage quality assurance system ensures product integrity from raw materials to finished feed.
qualityPage.stage1Desc: Every incoming batch undergoes comprehensive analysis for nutritional content, contaminants, and quality parameters before entering production.
qualityPage.stage2Desc: Real-time monitoring during production ensures consistent quality at every stage of the manufacturing process.
qualityPage.stage3Desc: Finished products are tested against strict specifications before release, ensuring they meet or exceed customer expectations.
qualityPage.certificationsDesc: Our certifications represent independent validation of our commitment to quality and safety.
qualityPage.testingDesc: Our in-house laboratory is equipped with advanced analytical instruments to perform comprehensive testing on every batch of feed we produce.

careersPage.title: Join Our Team
careersPage.subtitle: Be part of a company that's feeding the world sustainably. Your career in animal nutrition starts here.
careersPage.whyDesc: We offer more than just a job. Join a team where your work makes a real difference in global food production.
careersPage.benefit1Desc: Comprehensive health insurance, wellness programs, and mental health support for you and your family.
careersPage.benefit2Desc: Continuous learning opportunities, training programs, and career advancement pathways.
careersPage.benefit3Desc: Flexible working arrangements, generous vacation policy, and family-friendly workplace.
careersPage.benefit4Desc: A diverse, inclusive environment where every voice is valued and respected.
careersPage.valuesDesc: These principles guide everything we do and define who we are as a company.
careersPage.value1Desc: We strive for the highest standards in everything we do.
careersPage.value2Desc: We embrace new ideas and continuous improvement.
careersPage.value3Desc: We operate with honesty, transparency, and respect.
careersPage.value4Desc: We are committed to environmental responsibility.
careersPage.positionsDesc: Ready to make an impact? Explore our current opportunities.
careersPage.ctaDesc: We're always looking for talented individuals who share our passion for quality and sustainability. Send us your resume and we'll keep you in mind for future opportunities.

distributorsPage.title: Partner With Us
distributorsPage.subtitle: Join our global network of distributors and bring premium Finnish feed solutions to your market.
distributorsPage.presenceDesc: FeedElvi distributors are serving customers across Europe and beyond. Find a distributor near you or become one.
distributorsPage.benefitsDesc: As a FeedElvi distributor, you'll have access to premium products, comprehensive support, and growth opportunities.
distributorsPage.benefit1Desc: Access to our complete range of high-quality Finnish feed products with competitive margins.
distributorsPage.benefit2Desc: Tap into the growing demand for premium animal nutrition in your region.
distributorsPage.benefit3Desc: Leverage FeedElvi's reputation for quality and Finnish excellence in animal nutrition.
distributorsPage.benefit4Desc: Comprehensive training, marketing materials, and ongoing technical support.
distributorsPage.requirementsDesc: We're looking for established businesses with experience in animal feed distribution.
distributorsPage.req1: Established business with relevant industry experience
distributorsPage.req2: Existing distribution network and logistics capabilities
distributorsPage.req3: Knowledge of local animal feed market and regulations
distributorsPage.req5: Commitment to quality and customer service
distributorsPage.supportDesc: Contact our distribution team at distributors@feedelvi.fi for more information.
distributorsPage.formDesc: Fill out the form below and our team will get back to you within 2 business days.
distributorsPage.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your business and experience...
distributorsPage.successMessage: Thank you for your interest. Our team will review your application and contact you soon.
distributorsPage.ctaDesc: Join our network of successful distributors and help feed the world with quality Finnish nutrition.
